page.title: 16RUDDINGTON ARMY DEPOT
page.content: In{ RUDDINGTON }there is a derelict army depot and the perimeter is four miles long.It was used for the army and then they held used army car sales on the site but it closed about three years ago. My name is Nicalas and I interviewed people to find out what they would like the land used for now. Nine out of ten people said a leisure area would be a good idea. Then I asked them what they thought of the depot when it was open.The question was "Do you think it was a nuisance?"Seven out of ten people said yes mainly because of the traffic causing congestion in the High Street. One person said it was more of nuisance now because it was becoming an eye-sore.
